document.title: ESF Corpus
document.intro: The European Science Foundation Second Language Acquisition by Adult Immigrants collected spontaneous second language acquisition data of forty adult immigrant workers living in Western Europe. The program ran over 5 ½ years and was preceded by a one-year pilot study. It had been planne...
